description: A version of this golden, tart-sweet confection was served at the 76th birthday of the legendary Southern chef, Edna Lewis It is a true labor of love, so be sure to set aside a full afternoon to make it; this is not the sort of cake you want to rush.
title: Lemon Cake With Coconut Icing
title_page: Lemon Cake With Coconut Icing Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
A version of this golden, tart-sweet confection was served at the 76th birthday of the legendary Southern chef, Edna Lewis. It is a true labor of love, so be sure to set aside a full afternoon to make it; this is not the sort of cake you want to rush.
Featured in: When Chefs Celebrate; Salute To A Southern Master Chef.
Learn: How to Frost a Cake
